attributes.action: Help get lighting barriers and cctv down the river ouse in york
attributes.additional_details: York evening press covers all the lives lost and still missing the river ouse is so dangerous yet nothing is getting donw to prevent this
attributes.background: To many people fall in the river ouse it claims almost 5+ lives a year some never found we need help in gettin cctv lighting and barriers dow there my couain was found new years day it needs preventing

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://democracy.york.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
